Sentencas: Solid oxide cells can deliver highly efficient energy conversions between electricity and fuels/chemicals.
Titulo: Modelling of local mechanical failures in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: A central challenge of upscaling solid oxide cells is the probability of failure of the brittle ceramic components.
Titulo: Modelling of local mechanical failures in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: The failures of the ceramic components may lead to significant degradation or eventual failure of a stack.
Titulo: Modelling of local mechanical failures in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: To predict mechanical failures in a stack, a full stack model is needed, together with a local assessment of stresses at the vicinity of failing regions, e.g. the contact points between the cells and interconnects.
Titulo: Modelling of local mechanical failures in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: A conventional three-dimensional model requires a very fine discretization of the mesh to capture stress intensities.
Titulo: Modelling of local mechanical failures in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: Computational resources needed for such a model are therefore immense, and it is highly unlikely to compute at stack scale, as well describe the evolution over time.
Titulo: Modelling of local mechanical failures in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: In this work, the homogenization modelling framework for solid oxide cell stacks is extended to identify local mechanical failures.
Titulo: Modelling of local mechanical failures in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: Thus, the fracturing within a local failing point is examined by using a localization approach, where stresses in the stack model are linked to the local stresses and the energy release rate at the crack tip of the relevant interface.
Titulo: Modelling of local mechanical failures in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: This is done in a general manner, such that the local stresses and the energy release rate can be evaluated at every point in the stack at every instant of time without loss of computational efficiency.
Titulo: Modelling of local mechanical failures in solid oxide cell stacks

Sentencas: A 100-cell stack can be modelled in three dimensions with all coupled multiphysics in steady state within 3 min on a current workstation computer.
Titulo: Modelling of local mechanical failures in solid oxide cell stacks
